messages.content: You are a helpful assistant that will create a recipe with step by step instructions in a JSON format. You will always respond with the recipe in a JSON structured format.

How do I make a vegetarian lasagna?

{"title": "Vegetarian Lasagna", "servings": 6, "ingredients": [{"name": "lasagna noodles", "amount": 12, "unit": "pieces"}, {"name": "ricotta cheese", "amount": 500, "unit": "grams"}, {"name": "spinach", "amount": 300, "unit": "grams"}, {"name": "tomato sauce", "amount": 700, "unit": "milliliters"}, {"name": "mozzarella cheese", "amount": 250, "unit": "grams"}], "instructions": ["Preheat oven to 180°C.", "Boil lasagna noodles.", "Layer noodles with spinach, ricotta, sauce, and mozzarella.", "Bake for 45 minutes."]}

Can you give me a recipe for beef stroganoff?

{"title": "Beef Stroganoff", "servings": 4, "ingredients": [{"name": "beef sirloin", "amount": 500, "unit": "grams"}, {"name": "mushrooms", "amount": 250, "unit": "grams"}, {"name": "onion", "amount": 1, "unit": "piece"}, {"name": "sour cream", "amount": 200, "unit": "grams"}, {"name": "beef broth", "amount": 500, "unit": "milliliters"}, {"name": "butter", "amount": 30, "unit": "grams"}], "instructions": ["Slice beef into thin strips.", "Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter.", "Add beef and cook until brown.", "Stir in broth and simmer.", "Add sour cream before serving."]}

I need a recipe for a chocolate mousse dessert.

{"title": "Chocolate Mousse", "servings": 4, "ingredients": [{"name": "dark chocolate", "amount": 200, "unit": "grams"}, {"name": "heavy cream", "amount": 400, "unit": "milliliters"}, {"name": "sugar", "amount": 50, "unit": "grams"}, {"name": "egg whites", "amount": 3, "unit": "pieces"}], "instructions": ["Melt chocolate in a double boiler.", "Whisk egg whites to stiff peaks.", "Whip cream with sugar until soft peaks form.", "Fold whipped cream and egg whites into melted chocolate.", "Chill in fridge for at least 2 hours before serving."]}

What's a good recipe for a quiche Lorraine?

{"title": "Quiche Lorraine", "servings": 6, "ingredients": [{"name": "shortcrust pastry", "amount": 1, "unit": "sheet"}, {"name": "bacon", "amount": 150, "unit": "grams"}, {"name": "gruyere cheese", "amount": 100, "unit": "grams"}, {"name": "eggs", "amount": 3, "unit": "pieces"}, {"name": "heavy cream", "amount": 250, "unit": "milliliters"}], "instructions": ["Preheat oven to 190°C.", "Line a pie dish with pastry.", "Cook bacon until crisp.", "Whisk together eggs and cream, add cheese and bacon.", "Pour into pastry shell and bake for 30 minutes."]}

I need a quick recipe for spaghetti carbonara.

Can you provide a recipe for chicken curry?

{"title": "Chicken Curry", "servings": 4, "ingredients": [{"name": "chicken breasts", "amount": 500, "unit": "grams"}, {"name": "onion", "amount": 1, "unit": "piece"}, {"name": "garlic cloves", "amount": 2, "unit": "pieces"}, {"name": "curry powder", "amount": 2, "unit": "tablespoons"}, {"name": "coconut milk", "amount": 400, "unit": "milliliters"}], "instructions": ["Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces.", "Sauté onion and garlic until soft.", "Add curry powder and cook for 1 minute.", "Add chicken and cook until browned.", "Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes."]}
